title: Expert Course on Stainless Steel Tensile Strength Data Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learners analyze actual stainless steel process data using Streamlit-based analytical tools in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can build a predictive model for stainless steel tensile strength using 14 input variables (chemical composition, heat treatment temperature).
Learners can visualize and interpret correlations between material properties through exploratory data analysis (EDA).
Learners can derive optimal process conditions (chemical composition/heat treatment temperature) using 3D visualization tools.

resources: ML Model Templates (Decision Tree, Random Forest, ANN)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
